meanings.definition: A breed of dog known for its speed and hunting abilities.
meanings.sent1: The saluki raced across the field with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful saluki at the dog park today.
meanings.sent3: The saluki decided to challenge a cheetah to a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of a saluki chasing its prey.
meanings.sent5: The sleek and graceful saluki left a lasting impression on everyone who saw it.

meanings.definition: To refer to a specific type of dog breed.
meanings.sent1: I will saluki this breed in my report on dog breeds.
meanings.sent2: Please saluki the correct name of the dog breed in your presentation.
meanings.sent3: He likes to saluki different dog breeds to impress his friends.
meanings.sent4: She tends to saluki the same dog breed in all her stories.
meanings.sent5: Remember to saluki the exact dog breed when talking to the vet.

meanings.definition: The name of a specific breed of dog.
meanings.sent1: The saluki is a graceful and elegant breed.
meanings.sent2: Do you own a saluki or a different breed of dog?
meanings.sent3: The saluki's name always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her love for the saluki breed is evident in her dog-themed decor.
meanings.sent5: The unique features of the saluki make it stand out among other breeds.
